body: This changes the installname of libgcc_s.1.dylib on OSX from an absolute path set by --prefix to @rpath/libgcc_s.1.dylib. This is important for relocating libgcc_s.1.dylib because install_name_tool will not change the ID but with add/change rpath. Has no impact on linux.
title: Make libgcc_s relocatable on Macos by adding @rpath to installname
